channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hirosaki Castle Reflections
item.description: There may be millions of cherry blossoms petals here. It is the 28th of April. Fully fledged cherry blossom season, with trees colored pink and white. The wind gently scattering so many into the air. There is a worry that all the petals might be blown from the trees in an instant, but they remain enshrouded in color even with a shower of petals falling. It falls like snow. Two months ago it was the heart of winter. How similar it is, how one can take a deep breath and relax when snow or petals or rain falls from above.
